abstract: Obama administration declassifies rules and procedures for targeting individuals outside of conventional war zones for killing, including by use of drones; rules were issued in 2013.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Releases Drone Strike ‘Playbook’ for Targeting Terrorism Suspects
headline.main: U.S. Releases Rules for Airstrike Killings of Terror Suspects

snippet: The disclosure of the “playbook” for drone strikes further lifts the secrecy cloaking a much disputed tactic for fighting terrorism outside conventional war zones....
lead_paragraph: The disclosure of the “playbook” for drone strikes further lifts the secrecy cloaking a much disputed tactic for fighting terrorism outside conventional war zones.
